description:
Get in the zone: complete focus, efficient flow, and confident movement. The Method is a great option for a one-quiver sport climbing shoe, thanks to it's moderate downturn and aggressive asymmetry. The BlackLabel rubber balances support and stickiness, providing purchase on thin edges and horrendous smears. The high-tension heel feels secure when heel hooking and forces your toes into the toebox when you're powering through overhangs.

  • Microfibre upper is resistant to stretch
  • Padded tongue is breathable and comfortable
  • Double Velcro® straps keep your foot locked in on aggressive heel hooks
  • Minimal, soft flex midsole keeps things sensitive in steep terrain
  • Moulded BlackLabel Fuse rubber provides confidence and grip on smears and small edges
  • Members typically size the same as their street shoe size
name: Black Diamond Method Rock Shoes - Men's
